did.unittitle: American Airlines vs. Allied Pilots Association Partial Testimony Transcript
did.abstract: Partial transcript of proceedings before a five-person American Airlines-Allied Pilots Association system board.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a partial transcript of proceedings before a five-person American Airlines-Allied Pilots Association system board.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: American Airlines vs. Allied Pilots Association Partial Testimony Transcript #5791m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
